evidence: When we plot sensitivity on the vertical axis against 1 - specificity on the horizontal axis, we get the ROC curve

triples.evidence: The true positive fraction is simply the sensitivity: among all real disease cases, what fraction we detect correctly.

evidence: if the curve bends upward toward the top-left corner, that indicates good diagnostic performance
